history.proof: intros m z n p Hinv Hexd Hiter. induction n as [| n IHn]. -- simpl. reflexivity. -- simpl. qsimpl time: 1 use: Iter_plus_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: Iter_plus_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: exd_Iter_f,Iter_plus_inv. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros m z n p Hinv Hexd Hiter.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart n, p : nat Hinv : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hiter : Iter (f m) p z = z IHn : Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z The term "n" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "Z".

ctx: intros m z n p Hinv Hexd Hiter.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z m : fmap z : dart n, p : nat Hinv : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hiter : Iter (f m) p z = z IHn : Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z Unable to unify "Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z" with "Iter (f m) (p + n * p) z = z".

ctx: intros m z n p Hinv Hexd Hiter.
exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (p i : nat), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) p z = z -> Iter (f m) (p + i) z = Iter (f m) i z m : fmap z : dart n, p : nat Hinv : inv_hmap m Hexd : exd m z Hiter : Iter (f m) p z = z IHn : Iter (f m) (n * p) z = z Unable to unify "(exd ?M3025 ?M3027 -> exd ?M3025 (Iter (f ?M3025) p ?M3027)) /\\ (exd ?M3025 (Iter (f ?M3025) p ?M3027) -> exd ?M3025 ?M3027)" with "Iter (f m) (p + n * p) z = z".

original: intros m z n p Hinv Hexd Hiter. induction n as [| n IHn]. -- simpl. reflexivity. -- simpl. rewrite Iter_plus_inv with (p:=p) (i:=n*p); try auto. apply IHn. apply exd_Iter_f with (n:=p); auto.
